post.text: Imagine a president who said all of these things.

comment.author: Michael
comment.text: re your latest ad with trump telling generals to go f*ck themselves. not nice, or respectful true..however, tell me no president ever said that in the heat of being angry, and tell everyone you never said that to your staff when they would say good morning you would say f*ck you? or are you going to lie about THAT too?

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: oh, and trump is REALLY from NYC, and since you lived in NY, you should know that NY-ers, well, just use that word alot..like an adjective or verb ya know..

replies.author: Charles
replies.text: SO HILLARY, YOU WANT TO PLAY THE RACE CARD? CHECK OUT HANNITY TONIGHT.....HE's SHOWING HOW YOU AND EVERYONE IN YOUR CAMPAIGN AND YOUR FAMIIY'S ACTUAL RACIST COMMENTS and FOOTAGE FOR YEARS!!

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: Ashley Weaver ok even better, i must've misread the article..definitely agree to that about isis!
